title: Which schools have the most creative methods to teach children? - Quora

response.answer_text: School is place for healthy learning.Each n every school have their different way of learning and ways of interaction between students n teacher. Being the student of kendriya vidyalaya the relationship between students and teachers are really appreciated.These teacher r very well qualified in respective subject.They r always pulling weaker students to come forward with new way of learning.All and all there is sustainable development in KVs.

Shri Ram Global School has a very creative approach to teach children. The syllabus is wonderful and inspires young minds to enjoy learning and explore. Their creative approaches to teach alphabets and vocabulary are especially interesting. The puzzles they solve on books are really good brain exercises. Congratulations to the people who designed the syllabus!
